author: JOEL MARTIN
title: Royal Knights prepared to face the future
text:
Royal Knights prepared to face the future
ROYAL CITY ‚Äî The Royal High School Class of 2025 can face anything together, Class President Aaliyah Guerrero told them at graduation Friday.
‚ÄúIt seems like just yesterday we were all playing during recess,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúSome of us were on the monkey bars, others played on the big tires, and then we had the ankle-biters who spent their recess on the red dots. I might have been one of those ankle-biters. But during it all ‚Ä¶ we learned to be more than just friends. We learned how to be present when it matters. Each of us faced battles that no one else fought. But here we are, not because we conquered classes, but because we showed up.‚Äù
The graduation ceremonies at Royal High School began with a senior parade. Students, friends and family gathered in the high school parking lot and, accompanied by fire and police sirens, took one last loop through town in vehicles festooned with banners, flags and streamers. Then the students assembled on the football field as their families watched from the stands.
Many of the 112 students who graduated Friday were the first in their families to finish school, and more are the first to pursue post-secondary education. Principal Courtney McCoy began the commencement ceremony by asking those students to stand and be recognized.
Besides Guerrero, class Treasurer Jade Flores Ayala addressed her peers.
‚ÄúWe won't always know what's coming next,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúBut if high school has taught us anything, it‚Äôs that we can overcome any challenges and accomplish great things. So, let's carry this spirit with us. Follow your dreams, keep learning, because the world needs our voice, our creativity and our courage.‚Äù
Student speaker David De La Rosa Jr. thanked the teachers and parents who had guided the class along.
‚ÄúYou cheered us on, kept us going and believed in us when we didn‚Äôt always believe in ourselves,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúYour love, patience and support gave us the foundation we needed to grow.‚Äù
The guest speaker, chosen by the students, was English and Language Arts teacher Ausencio Delgado.
‚ÄúLook at this crowd of caps and gowns, grinning like you just pulled off the ultimate senior prank,‚Äù Delgado said. ‚ÄúFour years ago, you walked in nervous, maybe a little scared, but definitely excited. Now here you are, terrified, anxious and ready for a new adventure ‚Ä¶ Courage isn‚Äôt the absence of fear. It‚Äôs wrestling fear to the ground. It‚Äôs launching yourself into the air, trusting you‚Äôll land on your feet. It‚Äôs showing up even when you might stumble.
Go forth and make your mark, Royal Knights,‚Äù Delgado concluded. ‚ÄúWe believe in you. I believe in you.‚Äù

author: Sara, Sanz
title: Ester Exp√≥sito cuenta c√≥mo vivi√≥ la explosi√≥n del √©xito: ‚ÄúTe cambia la vida‚Äù
text:
Se sincera
Ester Exp√≥sito cuenta c√≥mo vivi√≥ la explosi√≥n del √©xito: ‚ÄúTe cambia la vida‚Äù
La actriz ha confesado todos los cambios que ha sufrido tras ganar popularidad de forma tan repentina. ¬°Desc√∫brelo!
Publicidad
Esta noche El Hormiguero ha recibido la visita de lujo de Ester Exp√≥sito, una de las actrices con m√°s influencia de nuestro pa√≠s. Su √©xito, casi de un d√≠a para otro gracias a su papel en la serie √âlite, le ha llevado a acumular 28,6 millones de seguidores en sus redes sociales.
Durante la entrevista, Pablo Motos ha querido saber c√≥mo afront√≥ Ester Exp√≥sito ese √©xito inmediato con tan solo 18 a√±os, cuando debut√≥ en esta conocida serie: ‚ÄúNada vuelve a ser lo mismo‚Äù, ha reconocido la actriz, a pesar de que ‚Äúles hab√≠an preparado para lo que se pod√≠a venir‚Äù antes de su estreno.
Sin embargo, Exp√≥sito tiene muy claro que no va a dejar de hacer cosas que hac√≠a antes de ser famosa porque su vida haya cambiado: ‚ÄúSalgo mucho de fiesta, eso no lo he dejado‚Äù, ha reconocido en El Hormiguero. ¬°Revive aqu√≠ la
 entrevista completa de Ester Exp√≥sito!
El contenido al que hace referencia la informaci√≥n forma parte de un programa del 23 de noviembre de 2022 que Antena 3 ha vuelto a emitir este jueves.
Publicidad

author: APRN News
title: U.S. Navy apologizes for Southeast Alaska burning and bombardment of Kake in 1869
text:
Navy Rear Adm. Mark Sucato issues a formal apology for the 1869 bombardment of Kake at the village‚Äôs community center on Saturday, Sept. 21, 2024. (Screenshot from Sealaska Heritage Institute livestream) Over 150 years have passed since the U.S. Navy bombarded Kake, a Tlingit village in Southeast Alaska. Navy representatives visited this weekend to formally apologize for the winter attack, which left many people to starve or die of exposure after the village was destroyed.
At Kake‚Äôs community center on Saturday, about a dozen elders walked or were wheeled to the front of the crowd, where they saluted the American flag as a Navy musician sang the Star-Spangled Banner. The men wore Tlingit button vests and blankets over their shoulders, and veterans‚Äô caps on their heads denoting the military branch and foreign wars they served in ‚Äî Korea, Vietnam, Iraq.
Joel Jackson is the president of Kake‚Äôs tribe, called the Organized Village of Kake. He said he couldn‚Äôt help but point out the irony.
‚ÄúOur veterans have been in every major conflict,‚Äù Jackson said. ‚ÄúEven though they took our land, our men still went and fought for their country. I‚Äôm very proud of them for their service.‚Äù
To Jackson‚Äôs right, a totem pole, carved by local artist Rob Mills, stood behind the American flag. Half of the pole was blackened by fire, to represent the centuries of colonial violence endured by the Tlingit people.
Jackson said the Navy‚Äôs apology was a long time coming.
‚ÄúI talked to a lawyer, and he said the military will never apologize or offer restitution for what they have done,‚Äù said Jackson. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm glad it‚Äôs happening in my lifetime.‚Äù
‚ÄòWrongful military activity‚Äô An unexploded shell from the 1869 bombardment of Kake. (Courtesy Sealaska Heritage Institute) The attack took place in January of 1869, just two years after the U.S. purchased Alaska from Russia ‚Äî in the dead of winter.
The year before, American soldiers had attacked a Chilkat leader, Colchika, who left the fight with one of their rifles. Soon after, an army sentinel shot and killed two Kake Tlingit people who were trying to leave Sitka by canoe. The group‚Äôs lone survivor, a clan leader, asked the Army garrison for compensation for their deaths. Gen. Jefferson C. Davis refused.
About a month later, in retribution, a party of Kake Tlingit people killed two white trappers on Admiralty Island. Jackson says they were acting in accordance with Tlingit law.
When Davis learned of those killings, he ordered the USS Saginaw to attack Kake. The warship‚Äôs crew found the village mostly empty, but they burned and bombarded it to the ground ‚Äî destroying homes, food caches, canoes, and totem poles.
The bombardment left the people of Kake without food or shelter. Though historians haven‚Äôt determined the number of deaths, oral history records many ‚Äî especially among elders and children.
In its apology, the Navy called the attack ‚Äúwrongful military activity.‚Äù But Jackson calls it part of a series of acts of genocide .
‚ÄúIt basically is still in our DNA today,‚Äù said Jackson. ‚ÄúBecause it wasn‚Äôt just a bombardment, it was the boarding schools and all the pandemics that we had back then. Trying to erase our people from this land.‚Äù
‚ÄòThe beginning of a dialogue‚Äô U.S. Sen. Lisa Murkowski, who is an adopted member of the Tlingit Deisheetaan clan, spoke at the ceremony. She said she hopes the Navy‚Äôs apology will promote healing.
‚ÄúAt some moment, there has to be the time that the healing can begin, and that moment needs to be now,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúIt is my hope that we can move together forward with respect and understanding for each other‚Äôs cultures, for each other‚Äôs worldviews, and that with these words of apology, respect is finally afforded to the people of Kake.‚Äù
Navy Rear Adm. Mark Sucato stepped up to the podium and said the service regrets how long it took to apologize.
‚ÄúThe Tlingit people of Kake did not deserve the destruction of their villages by U.S. Naval forces,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWe are invested in supporting Kake‚Äôs healing. This is the beginning of a dialogue towards making amends.‚Äù
Jackson, the tribal president, didn‚Äôt accept the apology outright. Instead, he turned to the clan leaders at the gathering.
‚ÄúYou all heard the apology ‚Äî what do you think?‚Äù Joel asked. ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt have to answer, but as the tribal president, I believe we should acknowledge the apology and move forward.‚Äù
Some clan leaders then shared stories from their ancestors who survived the attack. Others thanked the visitors for the apology, which the tribe ultimately accepted.
But the Navy‚Äôs work isn‚Äôt over. Now they‚Äôre speaking with Wrangell and Angoon‚Äôs tribes to apologize to clans that also suffered in the series of attacks. Those ceremonies will take place later this fall.
KTOO 360TV will air the U.S. Navy‚Äôs apology for the Kake bombardment on Sunday, Sept. 29 at 12:30 p.m.

author: @WABI_TV5
title: All Saints Catholic School Robotics Team ready for world competition
text: All Saints Catholic School Robotics Team ready for world competition BANGOR, Maine (WABI) - The Robotics Team at Bangor‚Äôs All Saints Catholic School did quite well in the state competition. ‚ÄúWe challenge ourselves more so that we were more powerful, which is how we won the Excellence Award, which is the best overall at the competition and individually. So, we had the best build, the best document, and the best program out of every single team.‚Äù explained Lizzi Bergin, member of the robotics team. ‚ÄúWe placed first in Division One. We won the highest place award there. It‚Äôs like it all was steady, I mean we just shot up in skill and devotion to it. It takes a lot of willpower to push through because it gets stressful.‚Äù said McKinley Robinson-Rice, member of the robotics team. After doing well in the state competition, they have the opportunity to compete with 498 schools from 50 countries in the Vex Robotics World Competition in Dallas, Texas. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre traveling halfway across the country just to go do what we thought was just a little club every Fridays. Like, I got into it, just thinking it was just something extra to do, and I never really expected to go this far with it.‚Äù added Robinson-Rice. Copyright 2024 WABI. All rights reserved.

organizations.name: all saints catholic school robotics team

author: @que_diario
title: Hor√≥scopo del 31 de mayo de 2024
text:
En el hor√≥scopo de hoy, 31 de mayo de 2024, los astros traen una combinaci√≥n de energ√≠as √∫nicas y poderosas. Este d√≠a se presenta como una oportunidad para reflexionar, tomar decisiones importantes y avanzar hacia nuevos objetivos. Cada signo del zodiaco har√° frente a varios desaf√≠os y recibir√° bendiciones espec√≠ficas, y por eso en este texto te damos una visi√≥n detallada para que aproveches al m√°ximo las influencias c√≥smicas del d√≠a .
Aries (21 de marzo ‚Äì 19 de abril) Aries, hoy es un d√≠a para enfocarte en tus relaciones personales. La comunicaci√≥n ser√° clave para resolver malentendidos y fortalecer v√≠nculos. Si tienes alg√∫n conflicto pendiente, es el momento de abordarlo con paciencia y empat√≠a. En el trabajo, podr√≠as recibir una oferta interesante o una propuesta que te permitir√° demostrar tus habilidades. Aprovecha esta oportunidad para brillar y destacar. En el amor, muestra tu lado m√°s tierno y comprensivo, tu pareja lo agradecer√°.
Tauro (20 de abril ‚Äì 20 de mayo) Para Tauro, el enfoque del d√≠a est√° en la estabilidad financiera y el bienestar personal. Es un buen momento para revisar tus finanzas y hacer ajustes en tu presupuesto. Podr√≠as encontrar formas de ahorrar o invertir de manera m√°s eficiente. En el √°mbito personal, es importante que te dediques tiempo a ti mismo, ya sea a trav√©s de una actividad relajante o practicando un hobby que disfrutes. En el amor, es un buen d√≠a para planificar una cita especial y sorprender a tu pareja.
G√©minis (21 de mayo ‚Äì 20 de junio) G√©minis, hoy sentir√°s una gran necesidad de expresarte y comunicar tus ideas. Aprovecha esta energ√≠a para iniciar conversaciones significativas y compartir tus pensamientos con quienes te rodean. En el √°mbito laboral, tu creatividad estar√° en su punto m√°s alto, lo que te permitir√° encontrar soluciones innovadoras a problemas antiguos. En el amor, es un buen momento para abrir tu coraz√≥n y ser honesto acerca de tus sentimientos. La sinceridad fortalecer√° tu relaci√≥n.
C√°ncer (21 de junio ‚Äì 22 de julio) C√°ncer, hoy es un d√≠a para enfocarte en tu hogar y en tu familia. Podr√≠as sentir la necesidad de hacer cambios en tu entorno para crear un espacio m√°s armonioso y confortable. Es un buen momento para reorganizar tu casa o incluso considerar una renovaci√≥n. En el trabajo, la cooperaci√≥n con tus colegas ser√° fundamental para alcanzar tus metas. En el amor, dedica tiempo a escuchar a tu pareja y a compartir momentos de intimidad que fortalezcan el v√≠nculo emocional.
Leo (23 de julio ‚Äì 22 de agosto) Leo, hoy es un d√≠a para brillar y mostrar tu liderazgo. Tu carisma y confianza estar√°n en su apogeo, lo que te permitir√° influir positivamente en los dem√°s. En el trabajo, podr√≠as asumir un nuevo rol o proyecto que te permitir√° demostrar tu capacidad para dirigir y motivar a tu equipo. En el √°mbito personal, es un buen momento para reconectar con amigos y seres queridos. En el amor, sorprende a tu pareja con un gesto rom√°ntico y espont√°neo que reavive la pasi√≥n.
Virgo (23 de agosto ‚Äì 22 de septiembre) Para Virgo, el enfoque del d√≠a est√° en la organizaci√≥n y la planificaci√≥n. Es un buen momento para poner en orden tus asuntos y establecer metas claras para el futuro. En el trabajo, tu atenci√≥n al detalle y tu capacidad para analizar situaciones te permitir√°n encontrar soluciones efectivas a problemas complejos. En el √°mbito personal, dedica tiempo a cuidar de tu salud y bienestar, ya sea a trav√©s de ejercicio, meditaci√≥n o una alimentaci√≥n equilibrada. En el amor, muestra tu lado m√°s afectuoso y comprensivo.
Libra (23 de septiembre ‚Äì 22 de octubre) Libra, hoy es un d√≠a para enfocarte en el equilibrio y la armon√≠a en todas las √°reas de tu vida. Podr√≠as sentir la necesidad de mediar en conflictos y buscar soluciones justas para todos. En el trabajo, tu diplomacia y habilidades de negociaci√≥n ser√°n clave para resolver desacuerdos y avanzar en proyectos conjuntos. En el √°mbito personal, es un buen momento para disfrutar de actividades culturales o art√≠sticas que te inspiren. En el amor, es un d√≠a para fortalecer la conexi√≥n con tu pareja a trav√©s de la comprensi√≥n y el apoyo mutuo.
Escorpio (23 de octubre ‚Äì 21 de noviembre) Escorpio, hoy es un d√≠a para profundizar en tus emociones y explorar tus deseos m√°s √≠ntimos. Es un buen momento para la introspecci√≥n y para trabajar en tu crecimiento personal. En el trabajo, podr√≠as enfrentar desaf√≠os que pondr√°n a prueba tu determinaci√≥n y resiliencia, pero conf√≠a en tus habilidades para superarlos. En el √°mbito personal, es importante que te rodees de personas que te apoyen y te inspiren. En el amor, es un buen momento para tener conversaciones profundas y sinceras con tu pareja.
Sagitario (22 de noviembre ‚Äì 21 de diciembre) Para Sagitario, el d√≠a de hoy se presenta como una oportunidad para expandir tus horizontes y explorar nuevas oportunidades. Tu esp√≠ritu aventurero y tu deseo de aprender te llevar√°n a buscar experiencias enriquecedoras. En el trabajo, podr√≠as recibir noticias sobre un proyecto emocionante o una oportunidad de viajar. En el √°mbito personal, dedica tiempo a actividades que te apasionen y que te permitan crecer. En el amor, sorprende a tu pareja con una aventura espont√°nea que fortalezca su v√≠nculo.
Capricornio (22 de diciembre ‚Äì 19 de enero) Capricornio, hoy es un d√≠a para enfocarte en tus responsabilidades y en la consecuci√≥n de tus metas. Tu disciplina y determinaci√≥n estar√°n en su punto m√°s alto, lo que te permitir√° avanzar significativamente en tus proyectos. En el trabajo, podr√≠as recibir reconocimiento por tus esfuerzos y dedicaci√≥n. En el √°mbito personal, es importante que equilibres tu vida profesional con momentos de descanso y relajaci√≥n. En el amor, dedica tiempo a tu pareja y a fortalecer la conexi√≥n emocional entre ambos.
Acuario (20 de enero ‚Äì 18 de febrero) Acuario, hoy es un d√≠a para explorar tu creatividad y tus ideas innovadoras. Tu mente estar√° llena de inspiraci√≥n, lo que te permitir√° encontrar soluciones originales a problemas antiguos. En el trabajo, podr√≠as iniciar un nuevo proyecto que te apasione y que te permita expresar tu individualidad. En el √°mbito personal, dedica tiempo a actividades que te permitan desconectar y recargar energ√≠as. En el amor, es un buen momento para sorprender a tu pareja con un gesto inesperado y significativo.
Piscis (19 de febrero ‚Äì 20 de marzo) Piscis, hoy es un d√≠a para conectarte con tus emociones y con tu intuici√≥n. Tu sensibilidad estar√° a flor de piel, lo que te permitir√° percibir las necesidades de los dem√°s y actuar en consecuencia. En el trabajo, tu empat√≠a y tu capacidad para trabajar en equipo ser√°n claves para alcanzar tus metas. En el √°mbito personal, dedica tiempo a actividades que te permitan relajarte y encontrar paz interior. En el amor, es un buen momento para fortalecer la conexi√≥n emocional con tu pareja y compartir tus sentimientos m√°s profundos.
En definitiva, el hor√≥scopo de hoy, 31 de mayo de 2024, ofrece una oportunidad para cada signo del zodiaco de crecer y avanzar en diferentes √°reas de su vida. Ya sea a trav√©s de la comunicaci√≥n, la introspecci√≥n, la creatividad o la b√∫squeda de equilibrio, las influencias c√≥smicas del d√≠a nos invitan a aprovechar las oportunidades que se nos presentan y a enfrentar los desaf√≠os con determinaci√≥n y optimismo . Recuerda que, independientemente de tu signo, la clave para un d√≠a exitoso reside en mantener una actitud positiva y abierta a las posibilidades que el universo tiene reservadas para ti.
